actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Community Opportunity.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Housing and Community Opportunity

official_title: To amend the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 to reauthorize the national flood insurance program, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 to extend the national flood insurance program from FY 1997 through 1999. Authorizes appropriations for specified studies for FY 1998 and 1999.

titles.title: To amend the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 to reauthorize the national flood insurance program, and for other purposes.
